text: The 1972–1973 Algerian Championnat National was the 11th season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 16 teams contested the league, with MC Alger as the defending champions. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 1972-1973 * WA Boufarik * USM Sétif * WA Tlemcen Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 1973-1974 * GC Mascara * CS Cirta * JS Djijel ==League table== ==References== ==External links== *1972–73 Algerian Championnat National Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 seasons Category:1972–73 in Algerian football Algeria
title: 1972–73 Algerian Championnat National
